contentSourceType.name: UrlSource
contentSourceType.description: This content source retrieves packages from a remote system identified by a URL.

c:simple-property.name: rootUrl
c:simple-property.description: The URL that contains all content that is to be served by this content source.

c:simple-property.name: indexFile
c:simple-property.description: The index file that defines all the content that can be found on the remote server. If this is not a full URL, it is assumed to be relative to the root URL.

c:simple-property.name: filenameFilter
c:simple-property.description: A regular expression that identifies a file of this package type (e.g. '.*\.jar', '.*/i686/.*\.rpm$')

c:simple-property.name: packageTypeName
c:simple-property.description: The name that identifies the kind of package this type represents (e.g. 'ear', 'rpm')

c:simple-property.name: architectureName
c:simple-property.description: The specific hardware architecture this type of package can be deployed on. If there is no specific architecture required, use 'noarch'. (e.g. 'i686', 'amd64')

c:simple-property.name: resourceTypeName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the resource type on which this package can be deployed. This is the resource type name as defined in the agent plugin. (e.g. 'Linux', 'JBossAS Server')

c:simple-property.name: resourceTypePluginName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the plugin that defined the resource type. (e.g. 'Platform', 'JBossAS')

contentSourceType.name: HttpSource
contentSourceType.description: This content source retrieves packages from a remote HTTP server, possibly via a proxy.

c:simple-property.name: rootUrl
c:simple-property.description: The HTTP URL that contains all content that is to be served by this content source.

c:simple-property.name: indexFile
c:simple-property.description: The index file that defines all the content that can be found on the remote server. If this is not a full URL, it is assumed to be relative to the root URL.

c:simple-property.name: filenameFilter
c:simple-property.description: A regular expression that identifies a file of this package type (e.g. '.*\.jar', '.*/i686/.*\.rpm$')

c:simple-property.name: packageTypeName
c:simple-property.description: The name that identifies the kind of package this type represents (e.g. 'ear', 'rpm')

c:simple-property.name: architectureName
c:simple-property.description: The specific hardware architecture this type of package can be deployed on. If there is no specific architecture required, use 'noarch'. (e.g. 'i686', 'amd64')

c:simple-property.name: resourceTypeName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the resource type on which this package can be deployed. This is the resource type name as defined in the agent plugin. (e.g. 'Linux', 'JBossAS Server')

c:simple-property.name: resourceTypePluginName
c:simple-property.description: The name of the plugin that defined the resource type. (e.g. 'Platform', 'JBossAS')

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.description: Username used to log into the HTTP server

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.description: Password used to log into the HTTP server

c:simple-property.name: proxyUrl
c:simple-property.description: Optional. URL of the proxy server to use for this connection.

c:simple-property.name: proxyPort
c:simple-property.description: Optional. Port of the proxy server to use for this connection.

c:simple-property.name: proxyUsername
c:simple-property.description: Optional. If the proxy requires authentication, this is the user to log in as.

c:simple-property.name: proxyPassword
c:simple-property.description: Optional. If the proxy requires authentitcation, this is the password for the user.
